results.title: Service information | Missed collections | Harborough District Council
results.snippet: We will only collect missed bins (black and blue-lidded) that are reported within 7 days of the collection date. We will only empty green garden waste bins.

results.title: Report it | Harborough District Council
results.snippet: Report issues, concerns and problems such as a missed bin collection, fly-tipping, nuisance, anti-social behaviour and much more online.

results.title: Bins and collections information | Harborough District Council
results.snippet: Please note that collection of the green bin for Garden Waste is a chargeable subscription service. ... Report a missed bin · Feedback on this page · Contact us.

results.title: Emergencies | Emergencies | Harborough District Council
results.snippet: Report issues, concerns and problems such as a missed bin collection, fly-tipping, nuisance, anti-social behaviour and much more online via our Report it page.

results.snippet: Grit bins. Request a grit bin. All requests for new salt bins must be submitted to your local Town, Parish, District or Borough Council:.

selected_links.title: Service information | Missed collections | Harborough District Council
strengths: Direct link to information on missed collections
Snippet clearly indicates that the information is about missed bin collections
selected_links.reasoning: This result provides a direct link to information specifically regarding missed collections which appears to be relevant to council customer’s needs.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.answer_quality: The content partially answers this need, providing instructions on how to report a missed collection but neglects to mention the specific steps for reporting a late put-out bin.
Reason.reasoning: Although the content provides the steps to follow before reporting a missed collection and some vehicle limitations, it does not explicitly state how a resident can report a late put-out bin, which is crucial information for someone wanting their forgotten bin collected.
Reason.next_actions: The next step for this resident would be checking other council resources or contacting the council's customer service.

analysis.overall_assessment: While the content provides helpful details about vehicle limitations and factors to consider before reporting a missed collection, it falls short on the specific instructions for reporting late put-out bins. This could result in residents being unsure of how to proceed when they forget to put out their bin, leading to dissatisfaction.
